thumb.name: Love You Top to Bottom
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EI Love You From%3Cbr%3EThe Top of Your Sweet.%3Cbr%3ELittle Headsy-Weadsy%3Cbr%3EDown To Your Cute.%3Cbr%3ELittle Toesy-Woesy!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...and that includes%3Cbr%3Eyour good-lookin'%3Cbr%3EBunsy-Wunsy!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: To Share My Life with You
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EJeremy.%3Cbr%3Ewhen I look at you.%3Cbr%3EI see so many things--%3Cbr%3EI see my partner.%3Cbr%3Ethe one I want to wake up with %3Cbr%3Eand come home to.%3Cbr%3Ethe one %3Cbr%3EI need by my side%3Cbr%3Eand in my heart%3Cbr%3Ewhen life gets tough...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...the one who 'gets' my jokes%3Cbr%3Eand shares my laughter%3Cbr%3Eand isn't embarrassed%3Cbr%3Ewhen I act a little silly...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWhen I look at you.%3Cbr%3EI see the promise%3Cbr%3Eof a future%3Cbr%3Esealed with such%3Cbr%3Ea tender. knowing love.%3Cbr%3EWhen I look at you.%3Cbr%3EI see the one I want to %3Cbr%3Eshare my life with--%3Cbr%3Emy very best friend.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: You're Beautiful Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E Morgan...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EYou are%3Cbr%3Ethe most beautiful part%3Cbr%3Eof my life.

thumb.name: You Brought Me Direction
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EKathleen. You've Changed My Life%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EIn you. Kathleen.%3Cbr%3EI not only found%3Cbr%3Emy one true love.%3Cbr%3Ebut also someone%3Cbr%3Ewho brought new meaning%3Cbr%3Eand direction%3Cbr%3Eto my life...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThank you%3Cbr%3Efor touching my life%3Cbr%3Ewith your care%3Cbr%3Eand gentle good sense --%3Cbr%3Efor loving me.%3Cbr%3Ebelieving in me.%3Cbr%3Eand helping make%3Cbr%3Emy world complete.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EI Love You for It%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Thoughts Keep Us Close
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ESometimes%3Cbr%3Ewhen I'm thinking of you. %3Cbr%3EFred.%3Cbr%3EI wonder %3Cbr%3Eif you might be %3Cbr%3Ethinking of me too.%3Cbr%3Eright at%3Cbr%3Ethe very same moment.%3Cbr%3Eand it makes me smile.%3Cbr%3Eknowing that we always have%3Cbr%3Eour thoughts %3Cbr%3Eto keep us close. %3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EI love you.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Hearts and Rainbow
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EFor Cory Today. tomorrow. and always%26#133;%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EMy heart belongs to you.%3Cbr%3E
